title: 2015년 Barton 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Barton. 판결일: 2015-03-26. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Robert Barton, Appellant
**판결일**: 2015-03-26
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

**판사**: Clark, Egan, Lahtinen, McCarthy

## 인용

- 126 A.D.3d 1238
- 3 N.Y.S.3d 653

## 판결문 요약

                          State of New York
                   Supreme Court, Appellate Division
                      Third Judicial Department
Decided and Entered: March 26, 2015                    106183
________________________________

THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF
   NEW YORK,
                    Respondent,
      v                                     MEMORANDUM AND ORDER

ROBERT BARTON,
                    Appellant.
________________________________


Calendar Date:   February 9, 2015

Before:   Lahtinen, J.P., McCarthy, Egan Jr. and Clark, JJ.

                             __________


     Donnial K. Hinds, Albany, for appellant.

      P. David Soares, District Attorney, Albany (Brittany L.
Grome of counsel), for respondent.

                             __________


Lahtinen, J.P.

      Appeal from a judgment of the County Court of Albany County
(McDonough, J.), rendered July 31, 2013, convicting defendant
upon his plea of guilty of the crime of assault in the second
degree.

      Defendant pleaded guilty to assault in the second degree in
full satisfaction of a three-count indictment and waived his
right to appeal. Prior to being sentenced, defendant moved to
withdraw his plea. County Court denied the motion and thereafter
sentenced defendant, as a second felony offender, to three years
in prison, to be followed by five years of postrelease
supervision. Defendant now appeals.
                               -2-                  106183

      We affirm. Contrary to d...
